name: Are We Asleep?
description:
This game was inspired by the games I used to play as a kid. I used toys to play fantasy scenarios like RPGs.

The game is a physics-based platformer game. you will have to find your way through enemies and obstacles!

All Graphics, sound, music, and programming by me with the exception of the Light2D texture which was found here:
https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/tutorials/2d/2d_lights_and_shadows.htm

Project Github
I hope the game is not too hard! Have fun!

Controls

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Space - Jump

F - Enable/Disable Building Mode

R - Reset the game

Left Mouse Button - Place Shape

1, 2, 3, 4 Number Buttons - To change the selected shape

Soundtrack:

The_Runner_01 · 1. Introduction The_Runner_01 · 2. Learning The Basics The_Runner_01 · 3. Dreams Of A Robot The_Runner_01 · 4. Adventure Time
